oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard, "A fully equipped Wireless Station operated by U.S. Troops."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A postcard bearing title "A fully equipped Wireless Station operated by U.S. Troops." it is a color-tinted photograph of a soldier operating a wireless station with large wheels. He sits on a crate and wears headpones. At bottom left is printed "Copy I F S Inc., N.Y." The reverse is stamped with an advertisement for Smiths Variety Store, Wayside, W. Va. Collected by Ethel Flesher Stewart of Parkersburg, W. Va.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
